java/liquibase/change/DeleteDataChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.DeleteStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00012 
00013 import java.util.Arrays;
00014 import java.util.HashSet;
00015 import java.util.Set;
00016 
00017 public class DeleteDataChange extends AbstractChange {
00018 
00019     private String schemaName;
00020     private String tableName;
00021     private String whereClause;
00022 
00023     public DeleteDataChange() {
00024         super("delete", "Delete Data");
00025     }
00026 
00027     public String getSchemaName() {
00028         return schemaName;
00029     }
00030 
00031     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00032         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00033     }
00034 
00035     public String getTableName() {
00036         return tableName;
00037     }
00038 
00039     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00040         this.tableName = tableName;
00041     }
00042 
00043     public String getWhereClause() {
00044         return whereClause;
00045     }
00046 
00047     public void setWhereClause(String whereClause) {
00048         this.whereClause = whereClause;
00049     }
00050 
00051     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00052 
00053         DeleteStatement statement = new DeleteStatement(getSchemaName() == null ? database.getDefaultSchemaName() : getSchemaName(), getTableName());
00054 
00055         statement.setWhereClause(whereClause);
00056 
00057         return new SqlStatement[]{
00058                 statement
00059         };
00060     }
00061 
00062     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00063         return "Data deleted from " + getTableName();
00064     }
00065 
00066     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00067         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("delete");
00068         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00069             node.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00070         }
00071 
00072         node.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00073 
00074         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(getWhereClause()) != null) {
00075             Element whereClause = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("where");
00076             whereClause.appendChild(currentChangeLogFileDOM.createTextNode(getWhereClause()));
00077             node.appendChild(whereClause);
00078         }
00079         return node;
00080     }
00081 
00082     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00083         Table dbObject = new Table(getTableName());
00084 
00085         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(dbObject));
00086     }
00087 
00088 }
